setupTasks.title: Run Setup & PR Finalization
setupTasks.description: Prepare the working branch, create or update PR, and ensure all prerequisites are in place for the exploration loop execution.
acceptance_criteria: Working branch exists and is checked out
PR created or updated with appropriate title and description
All prerequisites verified (epic exists, config validated)

teardownTasks.title: Generate Exploration Summary Report
teardownTasks.description: Generate a summary report documenting research findings, validation results, and recommendations from the exploration loop.
acceptance_criteria: All exploration tasks are closed or blocked
Report includes research findings and recommendations
Epic status updated appropriately based on exploration results

tasks.title: Research & Analysis
tasks.description: Conduct research on the problem space, gather requirements, analyze existing solutions, and document findings.
acceptance_criteria: Research artifacts saved to task directory

tasks.title: Validate Approach
tasks.description: Validate the proposed approach through prototyping, proof-of-concept, or feasibility analysis.
acceptance_criteria: Approach validated through prototype or analysis
